name: pnp-list-formatting-rota-css-table
title: Staff Rota Shifts View Format
shortDescription: This is a sample that uses `rowFormatter` to customise the entire display of a row. The aim is to demonstrate the following concepts:
longDescription: This is a sample that uses `rowFormatter` to customise the entire display of a row. The aim is to demonstrate the following concepts:

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
